name: d3-fcs
description: Daniel Ellis' implementation of the fourcolours algorithm for all scatterplot / graph data.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-fcs.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-fcs.js -c -m -o build/d3-fcs.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-fcs.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-fcs.js build/d3-fcs.min.js
